title: Incident Response Playbook
content:
# Incident Response

## P0 Procedure
1. Assign incident commander
2. Create incident channel or use #incidents
3. Identify root cause
4. Communicate ETA to stakeholders within 1 hour
5. Deploy fix through hotfix pipeline
6. Notify affected customers
7. Write postmortem within 48 hours

## Escalation Path
- P0: Engineering Manager -> Director -> VP
- Client-facing: Loop in Customer Success within 30 minutes
